theorem putnam_1969_a6
(x : ℕ → ℝ)
(y : ℕ → ℝ)
(hy1 : ∀ n ≥ 2, y n = x (n-1) + 2 * (x n))
(hy2 : ∃ c : ℝ, Tendsto y atTop (𝓝 c))
: ∃ C : ℝ, Tendsto x atTop (𝓝 C) := by
  obtain ⟨c, hc⟩ := hy2
  use (c - 2 * x 0) / 3
  have h1 : ∀ n, y n = x (n-1) + 2 * x n := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | zero => simp_all
    | succ n ih =>
      cases n with
      | zero => simp_all
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [hy1, Nat.succ_le_iff]
        <;> linarith
  have h2 : Tendsto (fun n => x n) atTop (𝓝 ((c - 2 * x 0) / 3)) := by
    have h3 := hc
    have h4 : ∀ n, x n = (y n - 2 * x n) / 3 := by
      intro n
      have h5 := h1 n
      have h6 := h1 (n + 1)
      have h7 := h1 0
      have h8 := h1 1
      have h9 := h1 2
      have h10 := h1 3
      simp at h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 h10
      linarith
    convert (tendsto_add_const_right _ _).comp (hc.sub (tendsto_const_nhds.mul (tendsto_const_nhds))) using 1
    ext n
    simp [h4]
    <;> ring
  exact h2
```
